snippet: The moves, combined with a plan to transfer a detainee to Sudan, are signs that the Obama administration has revived efforts to winnow the population, now at 162.
abstract: Pentagon announces involuntary repatriation of two longtime Guantanamo Bay detainees to Algeria; men, Djamel Ameziane and Belkacem Bensayah, had resisted repatriation out of fear of persecution.
lead_paragraph: The moves, combined with a plan to transfer a detainee to Sudan, are signs that the Obama administration has revived efforts to winnow the population, now at 162.

headline.main: Two Guantánamo Detainees Are Involuntarily Repatriated to Algeria
headline.print_headline: Two Detainees at Guantánamo Are Involuntarily Repatriated to Algeria
